alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan and southwestern Decatur Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Selden, or 15 miles northwest of Hoxie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Selden around 140 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
